Posts.Content: I went for my last FEC on Monday , due to under staffing they had me down that I had all three FEC. I was sent home at the second one with an infection but they hadn't taken off my note. Nurse rang down to my consultant who said move onto the T that they had ready. Not booked to see anyone till October before next chemo.  Find it really strange that are leaving the powerful FEC out. Nurses just said oh he has cleared it that's fine! Has this happened to anyone I feel I need the full course!  Many thanks xx
Posts.Title: Not having full FEC moved into T

Posts.Content: Thank you! I will let you know if I get to speak to anyone today , our unit splits the chats about FEC and T so I've no idea what side effect I might get
Posts.Title: Not having full FEC moved into T

Posts.Content: Unit cock up is the reason why. Thank you girls I will ring today and not wait until my appointment with then x
Posts.Title: Not having full FEC moved into T

Posts.Content: Just rang and was told not to worry and to speak to my consultant on my next appointment on 2nd of October. She said some ppl do miss out n it's fine ok then lol x
